text: Yabona; uMprofeti wahlebela omnye wabafazi bakhe (uHafsah) waza yena (uHafsah) wayixelela omnye (u’A- ishah). UAllâh Wenza okokuba yazeke kuye (uMthunywa); (uMthunywa) yena wachaza inxalenye wayishiya inxalenye yayo, ukumxelela kwakhe (uHafsah) ngayo, wathi yena: “Ngubani okuxelele oku?” Wathi yena (uMthunywa): “USolwazi, uMazisi nguYe (uAllâh) Ondixeleleyo.”
